name: Cakertron 3000
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN (OTHERWISE NOT ALL SPRITES ARE IN FRAME)

WASD to move

Space to pickup / place item

Get as many points as you can - 3 incorrect cakes and you lose :(

Programming by Cronabot | Art and Sound by Paralax

Cakertron 3000 is a cake decoration game, where you have to decorate the cakes quickly before they get packaged. This game is inspired by club penguin's "Pizzatron 3000" (RIP Club Penguin) but with a twist: you can move. Hope you have a bit of fun, and thanks for playing our game!
